short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find webpage discussions on the web. (e.g. Hacker News, Reddit)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tolon (토론) is a browser extension that helps you find discussions around the pages you're looking at on the web. It works by searching available sources for URL submissions.

While viewing a webpage, opening the extension will search available sources for URL submissions (discussion threads) and present a list of results.

Available sources:

- Hacker News
- Reddit

Tolon is mostly JavaScript plus a little CSS. There are no trackers. No data is sent (aside from the page URL query) or shared. All of the code is available on GitHub.
